text:

html: Mattis has helped transform the Pentagon over the last two years, prioritizing the personnel, training, readiness & modernization of our Armed Forces. America is safer and more secure because of his tremendous leadership, and I am grateful for his service to our nation.
text: Mattis has helped transform the Pentagon over the last two years, prioritizing the personnel, training, readiness & modernization of our Armed Forces. America is safer and more secure because of his tremendous leadership, and I am grateful for his service to our nation.

html: Jim Mattis is the definition of an American Patriot. From his enlistment in the Marine Corps to his service as Secretary of Defense, he has always served our nation with honor and integrity.
text: Jim Mattis is the definition of an American Patriot. From his enlistment in the Marine Corps to his service as Secretary of Defense, he has always served our nation with honor and integrity.

html: As a member of the Armed Services Committee, I will be asking administration officials for details about the plan, including how it aligns with America’s national security strategy. (3/3)
text: As a member of the Armed Services Committee, I will be asking administration officials for details about the plan, including how it aligns with America’s national security strategy. (3/3)

html: We cannot afford to repeat the mistake of the Obama Admin’s decision to prematurely withdraw from Iraq, which led to the rise of ISIS. I have concerns that withdrawal from Syria at the current time could lead to the resurgence of ISIS and provide a boost to Russia and Iran. (2/3)
text: We cannot afford to repeat the mistake of the Obama Admin’s decision to prematurely withdraw from Iraq, which led to the rise of ISIS. I have concerns that withdrawal from Syria at the current time could lead to the resurgence of ISIS and provide a boost to Russia and Iran. (2/3)

html: While I support the President’s goal of removing American troops from harm’s way, we need to make sure the withdrawal of America’s presence from Syria is done the right way, at the right time. (1/3)
text: While I support the President’s goal of removing American troops from harm’s way, we need to make sure the withdrawal of America’s presence from Syria is done the right way, at the right time. (1/3)

html: Thank you to Jeff Sessions for serving as a U.S. Senator and Attorney General. While I didn’t always agree with him, he led the DOJ with integrity and was committed to defending the rule of law without political bias or partiality. He’s a good man and I wish him all the best.
text: Thank you to Jeff Sessions for serving as a U.S. Senator and Attorney General. While I didn’t always agree with him, he led the DOJ with integrity and was committed to defending the rule of law without political bias or partiality. He’s a good man and I wish him all the best.

html: My statement on the release of Pastor Brunson. https://www.tillis.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/press-releases?id=C9ED8AF0-B5A3-4E69-AF2F-79B0F912205F#.W8DuWF33GTc.twitter … "Pastor Brunson is finally coming back home as a free man.”
text:
My statement on the release of Pastor Brunson. https://www.tillis.senate.gov/public/index.cfm/press-releases?id=C9ED8AF0-B5A3-4E69-AF2F-79B0F912205F#.W8DuWF33GTc.twitter …

"Pastor Brunson is finally coming back home as a free man.”

html: Today I voted for bipartisan legislation to modernize and protect America’s water infrastructure. This bill will keep drinking water safe, allow state and local communities to prioritize projects, and help our farmers better utilize the water they need. #WRDA

html: North & South Carolina: If you experienced damage from Hurricane #Florence, you can talk to someone in person about disaster assistance at a Disaster Recovery Center in your area. North & South Carolina: If you experienced damage from Hurricane #Florence, you can talk to someone in person about disaster assistance at a Disaster Recovery Center in your area.

text:

 Meat, poultry, seafood products

 Milk, cream, yogurt & other dairy products
 Opened baby formula
 Eggs and egg products
 Dough, cooked pasta
 Cooked or cut producthttps://flic.kr/p/KfCrZD

html: Inland flooding is the #1 cause of tropical storm fatalities. Follow these tips when in an area at risk or already flooded by #FlorenceNC: - Listen to local officials for evacuation notices. - DO NOT drive through standing water. A few inches of water can sweep a car away.pic.twitter.com/mhcXgDid1S
text:
Inland flooding is the #1 cause of tropical storm fatalities. Follow these tips when in an area at risk or already flooded by #FlorenceNC:
- Listen to local officials for evacuation notices.
- DO NOT drive through standing water. A few inches of water can sweep a car away.pic.twitter.com/mhcXgDid1S

html: Please share this safety info for #Florence: If trapped in a building, go to the highest floor. Do not climb into a closed attic; you may get trapped by rising floodwater. Get on the roof only if necessary. Call 9-1-1 for emergencies.pic.twitter.com/Hna2aGpmMP
text:
Please share this safety info for #Florence:
If trapped in a building, go to the highest floor.
Do not climb into a closed attic; you may get trapped by rising floodwater.
Get on the roof only if necessary.

Call 9-1-1 for emergencies.pic.twitter.com/Hna2aGpmMP

html: A disaster or tragedy is unexpected and often brings out strong emotions. If you or a loved one is seeking help in coping with the mental or emotional effects caused by #HurricaneFlorence, contact the Disaster Distress Helpline for free and confidential counseling.pic.twitter.com/tCTiC7BKOE

html: #FlorenceNC safety tips: - STAY INDOORS. Do not venture out during the storm. - Do NOT drive or walk through stagnant or moving floodwaters. - If your power goes out, do NOT operate gas powered generators or charcoal grills in or near your home. - Have your emergency kit ready!
text:
#FlorenceNC safety tips:
- STAY INDOORS. Do not venture out during the storm.
- Do NOT drive or walk through stagnant or moving floodwaters. 
- If your power goes out, do NOT operate gas powered generators or charcoal grills in or near your home.
- Have your emergency kit ready!

html: Storm surge is expected to peak at levels of 9 to 13 ft from Cape Fear all the way to Cape Lookout. Though there are no official reports of storm surge, waters are rising rapidly on the coast. If you are in these areas, stay indoors & do not venture outside (especially to beach).pic.twitter.com/WqA7lNXzp1

html: #HurricaneFlorence is expected to produce total rainfall accumulations of 20 to 30 inches with isolated maximum amounts of 40 inches. These numbers are hard to comprehend, but based on past experience, this amount of rain produces life-threatening, catastrophic flooding.pic.twitter.com/86zX1GzhVF
text: #HurricaneFlorence is expected to produce total rainfall accumulations of 20 to 30 inches with isolated maximum amounts of 40 inches. html: If you need to evacuate for Hurricane #Florence, today is your last day to go before the storm arrives. You can text SHELTER and your zip code (i.e. SHELTER 12345) to 4FEMA (43362) to locate an open emergency shelter near you.pic.twitter.com/vv0UPzw0wS

html: Latest models show a ridge building over eastern US slowing down Florence near our coast, stalling, then moving into SC. Impacts will still be felt far away from center of storm, and uncertainty still exists regarding magnitude of impacts in our area.pic.twitter.com/Ym8eB7Ko6t

html: On this day in 71B.C. the Thracian gladiator Spartacus was put to death by Marcus Licinius Crassus for disclosing confidential scrolls. When informed days later that in fact the Roman Senate had already publicly released the scrolls, Crassus replied “Oh, ok, my bad”.

html: It is disappointing that many Senate Democrats continue to give in to the pressure from partisan special interest groups, with many of them announcing their opposition—sight-unseen—before Judge Kavanaugh was even nominated. #SCOTUS

html: There is no applause line among the American people for ‘let’s get out of NATO’ and I am confident NATO will be stronger and more unified 10yrs from now with more members and funding. Unlike authoritarian countries, the US has co-equal branches to decide our treaties. #NATOSummit

html: I believe we can strike the right balance between being compassionate—especially towards children who were brought here through no fault of their own—and also being smart by taking steps needed to prevent future illegal immigration. (3/3)
text: I believe we can strike the right balance between being compassionate—especially towards children who were brought here through no fault of their own—and also being smart by taking steps needed to prevent future illegal immigration. (3/3)

html: Our nation is long-overdue for commonsense immigration reform, particularly when it comes to providing a path to naturalization for DACA recipients and securing our borders. (2/3)
text: Our nation is long-overdue for commonsense immigration reform, particularly when it comes to providing a path to naturalization for DACA recipients and securing our borders. (2/3)

html: We should not be separating children migrants from their families. Congress can take action to provide better long-term certainty and consistency on this issue in a way that does not incentivize unauthorized border crossings. (1/3)
text: We should not be separating children migrants from their families. Congress can take action to provide better long-term certainty and consistency on this issue in a way that does not incentivize unauthorized border crossings. (1/3)

html: Last week, @POTUS signed the #VAMISSIONAct into law. This bill helps our nation’s #veterans by: Providing timely access to quality healthcare Consolidating VA community care programs Introducing modernized VA pilot programs Improving payment processing and care delivery
text:
Last week, @POTUS signed the #VAMISSIONAct into law.

This bill helps our nation’s #veterans by:
Providing timely access to quality healthcare
Consolidating VA community care programs
Introducing modernized VA pilot programs
Improving payment processing and care delivery

html: The #VAMISSIONAct ensures veterans have timely access to quality care, whether in a brick & mortar VA facility or through one of VA’s community partners. I’m pleased my provisions to improve payment processing and authorize new pilot programs to modernize the VA were included.
